title: Were-Dinosaurs: Concerto of Doom
description: A few weeks ago, you and three friends discovered the ability to transform into dinosaurs . . . but where there is power, there are others who seek it for themselves.Continue the Were-Dinosaurs adventure as you, Tilly, Roy, and Julia take on a wealthy musician with a sinister talent, a Saber-Tooth Tiger with powers of his own, and perhaps scariest of all - the school dance.Sounds like someone is putting the “vile” back in “violinist.” It’s time for THESE dinosaurs to tip the scales . . .
author: S.B. Clark
